alert.note: Alert for Audrain; Marion; Monroe; Ralls; Shelby (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 3:31AM CDT until June 17 at 3:45AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 AM CDT FOR RALLS...AUDRAIN...SOUTHEASTERN SHELBY...SOUTHWESTERN MARION AND MONROE COUNTIES... At 331 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles south of Monroe City to near Santa Fe to near Sturgeon, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Mexico, Vandalia, Monroe City, Paris, Santa Fe, Perry, Laddonia, Center, Farber, Martinsburg, Rensselaer, Spaulding, Hunnewell, Rush Hill, Benton City, Vandiver, Stoutsville, The Landing, Florida and Indian Creek. This also includes Union Covered Bridge Historic Site and Mark Twain Lake Recreational Area. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in St Louis.
